title: Analyze Response Time for Emergency Services
description: A fire chief wants a report on the department's average response time over the last year to see if they are meeting their goals.

tasks.description: Retrieve all fire department dispatch and arrival time data for the last 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully queries the emergency dispatch database.

tasks.description: For each incident, calculate the response time (time from dispatch to arrival on scene).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system calculates the response time for thousands of incidents.

tasks.description: Generate a report showing the average response time by month and by station, and compare it to the department's 6-minute goal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed performance report for the fire chief.
